ble.gattPermission: The web browser did not give permission to use Bluetooth Low Energy
ble.gattServiceNotFound:
Connected to hub but failed to get {serviceName} service.
Ensure that you are using the most recent firmware.
If the problem persists, try removing the "{hubName}" device in your OS Bluetooth settings, then try connecting again.
ble.noWebBluetooth: This web browser does not support Web Bluetooth or it is not enabled.
ble.noBluetooth: No Bluetooth adapter could be found. Please connect or enable a Bluetooth Low Energy adapter and restart the browser.
ble.unexpectedError: Unexpected error while trying to connect: {errorMessage}

fileStorage.failedToInitialize: Failed to initial file storage. Changes will not be automatically saved.

flashFirmware.timedOut: The hub took too long to respond. Restart the hub and try again.
flashFirmware.bleError: There was a problem with Bluetooth.
flashFirmware.disconnected: The hub was disconnected before flashing was completed. Restart the hub and try again.
flashFirmware.hubError: The hub said something went wrong.
flashFirmware.unsupportedDevice: The connected hub is not supported.
flashFirmware.deviceMismatch: The firmware is for a different kind of hub from the connected hub.
flashFirmware.failToFetch: Failed to fetch firmware from the server: {status}
flashFirmware.badZipFile: The firmware.zip file is missing required files or is corrupt.
flashFirmware.badMetadata: The firmware.metadata.py file contains missing or invalid entries. Fix it then try again.
flashFirmware.compileError: The included main.py file could not be compiled. Fix it then try again.
flashFirmware.sizeTooBig: The combined firmware and main.py are too big to fit in the flash memory.
flashFirmware.unexpectedError: Unexpected error while trying to flash firmware: {errorMessage}

update.message: A new version of {appName} is available. Click {action} to start using the new version.

check.firmwareTooOld: A new firmware version is available for this hub. Please install the latest version to use all new features.
